name: Flower Power
description: Flowers and plant paintings on canvas.
extraDescription: The larger than normal depth creates a sculptural element to the art, and eliminates the need for a traditional frame.

name: Watercolors
extraDescription: Renditions of eye-popping watercolor paintings depicting interesting subjects and artwork.

name: Beautiful Creatures
description: Imaginative creatures and depictions of life. All paintings are oil and encaustic on canvas.
extraDescription: The larger than normal depth creates a sculptural element to the art, and eliminates the need for a traditional frame.

name: Bugs
description: An exploration of imaginative insects and bugs
extraDescription: The larger than normal depth creates a sculptural element to the art, and eliminates the need for a traditional frame.

name: Exploration in Shapes
description: An exploration into shapes and design
extraDescription: The larger than normal depth creates a sculptural element to the art, and eliminates the need for a traditional frame.

name: Wondrous Places
description: Studies of perspective from various destinations of travel.
extraDescription: All paintings are oil on canvas.

name: Wood Blocks
description: An expression of art in the form of painted wood blocks.
extraDescription: Reclaimed wood blocks reformed into art.
